name: type
description: The type of the field, should be one of the values of the forth column
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea | radio | checkbox | select | multi-select | date-picker | html | document | image | audio | video

name: name
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea | radio | checkbox | select | multi-select | date-picker | html | document | image | audio | video

name: label
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea | radio | checkbox | select | multi-select | date-picker | html | document | image | audio | video

name: required
description: Specify if input is required or not
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea | radio | checkbox | select | multi-select | date-picker | html

name: fieldMsg
description: Optional text to display below input
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea | radio | checkbox | select | multi-select | date-picker | html | document | image | audio | video

name: placeholder
description: Optional text to by default as input placeholder
available: text | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea

name: tooltip
description: Optional text to display in a tooltip above input when mouse is over input
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | textarea | radio | checkbox | select | multi-select | date-picker

name: rows
description: Optional number of rows in a textarea

name: limit
description: Maximum number of uploaded files for the given type or 0 for unlimited

name: value
available: text | password | email | number | phone | url | readonly | textarea | html

name: value
description:
Array of available value and which are selected by default.
Ex: [ {"v": "value1", "l": "Value 1", "selected": true}, {"v": "value2", "l": "Value 2"} ]

name: value
description: The value of the date picker
